udp._comment: Used only if selected as active interface

logging._comment_level: Options: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL
logging._comment_clear: true = clear previous log file on every startup
logging._comment_to_file: true = log messages will also be written to logs/system.log

file_transfer._comment_packet_size: Size in bytes of each fragment; adjust per hardware capability
file_transfer._comment_timeout_ms: Time in milliseconds to wait for an ACK before retrying
file_transfer._comment_max_retries: Maximum number of resend attempts per fragment before giving up
file_transfer._comment_download_dir: Directory where received files will be stored
